headline: Automotive Radar Market Report 2025-2032 | Automotive Industry Shifts Focus from Performance to Safety and Convenience Driving Growth
summary: The automotive radar market is projected to grow from USD 5.36 billion in 2025 to USD 22.83 billion by 2032, driven by a 23% CAGR. With an industry shift towards safety and convenience, radar technology is crucial for applications like intelligent park assist and autonomous emergency braking. The 7X-GHz frequency segment is expected to dominate, enhanced by stringent regulations mandating ADAS features such as emergency braking. In China, rapid advancements in 4D mmWave radar are fueling market
